string.text: Hmm, a strange command centre and what's more it's fully functional. Looks like someone's behind this Monolith…man, whoever it is, I'd love to find them and rip their dirty little hands off.
The Monolith calls to me. It really exists and my wishes will soon be granted.
The decoder, the key to the door, is either at the station or in the sarcophagus itself. It may help to find out more about the Monolith. Sharpshooter.
You made it after all, stalker. You turned out to be much stronger than we initially thought. Well, the time for us to talk has come. Head towards the signal. We'll be waiting for you.
